# UNAlertStyle.banner

**Case**

Banner alerts.

## Declaration

```swift
case banner
```

## Discussion

Alerts are displayed as a slide-down banner. Banners appear for a short time and then disappear automatically if the user does nothing.

## Presentation Styles

- **UNAlertStyle.none**: No alert.
- **UNAlertStyle.alert**: Modal alerts.
title: UNAlertStyle.banner
